name: Pacific Gas and Electric Company
description: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) is one of the largest combined natural gas and electric utilities in the United States, serving approximately 16 million people across a 70,000-square-mile service area in Northern and Central California. Founded in 1905, PG&E has a long history of providing safe and reliable energy services to its customers. The company is committed to transitioning to a cleaner energy future, investing significantly in renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydroelectric power. PG&E is also focused on enhancing grid resilience and safety, especially in the wake of increasing climate-related risks. The company works diligently to upgrade its infrastructure and implement advanced technologies to better serve its customers, improve energy efficiency, and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. PG&E’s commitment to sustainability is further reflected in its efforts to support electric vehicle charging infrastructure and promote energy conservation programs. In addition to its energy services, PG&E actively engages with local communities to foster economic development and enhance public safety. The company is also actively working to reduce the risks associated with wildfires through proactive vegetation management and improved emergency response protocols.

faq.answer: Patricia Poppe is the CEO of Pacific Gas and Electric Company.
